===Etymology===
May be a Japanese coinage from {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=しまつ}}-derived components, as {{m|ja|始|tr=shi||beginning}} + {{m|ja|末|tr=matsu||ending}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=goon|しまつ|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|しまつ}}

# the [[beginning]] and [[end]] of something
# the [[circumstances]] or [[details]] of something
# a [[result]] or [[outcome]] {{qualifier|usually a bad one}}
# [[solution]], [[settlement]], [[disposal]]

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|tr=trans|しまつ}}

# to [[conclude]], to bring to a [[conclusion]], to [[end]]
# to [[economize]] on something
# to [[solve]], to [[settle]], to [[dispose]] of or [[deal with]]
